column1: Little Goat Diner////Breakfast observation:  LG is trying too hard to raise the gastronomic level of breakfast food.  I chose corned beef hash and eggs because there was one omelette on the menu.  There were numerous egg choices
column2: however Kimchi and eggs (as an example) is not my first breakfast choice.  There were numerous pancake choices - not my cup of tea unless they're buckwheat (fat chance).  Heck
column3: breakfast is breakfast!  Go to Meli or Yolk or Ina's (she has a parking lot and is just down Randolph).
